name: You Got Steam, Punk?
description:
Welcome aboard the S.S.S.S., a highly advanced steamship traveling the open sea. Grab a mop and start scrubbing, sailor! Complete an onslaught of tasks to keep the ship afloat.

We had to make a lot of last-minute budget cuts but we had a ton of fun in general, next time our game will be even better!

----------Controls----------

WASD - Move

Hold Left Click - Hook shot

Swing - WASD (While Hooking)

Shift - Dash (While Swinging)

E - Complete Tasks

Swing Direction is intuitive :D

The game ends after the 6th task :)

The Team

BizzareMagician - Music

Gimli10003 - Sound design

CaptainCroaky - Plot / Writing

GidntSquia - Coding

VroWhat - Coding

Deditch - Project manager/Design Lead

Tarrott - Assets
